      • setPhotoViewRotation

        public void setPhotoViewRotation(float rotationDegree)
        Deprecated. use setRotationTo(float)
        Description copied from interface: IPhotoView
        Enables rotation via PhotoView internal functions. Name is chosen so it won't collide with View.setRotation(float) in API since 11
        Specified by:
        setPhotoViewRotation in interface IPhotoView
        Parameters:
        rotationDegree - - Degree to rotate PhotoView to, should be in range 0 to 360

public void setMaxScale(float maxScale)
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from interface: IPhotoView
        Use IPhotoView.setMaximumScale(float maximumScale) instead, this will be removed in future release

         

        Sets the maximum scale level. What this value represents depends on the current ImageView.ScaleType.
        Specified by:
        setMaxScale in interface IPhotoView
        Parameters:
        maxScale - maximum allowed scale preset
